item.title: V-mas at Ladyballs
item.description:
We all had vday baggies like I guess we did in elementary school. I got a lot! I was surprised. I had a hard time coming up with cards myself. My favorite one I made just said "pinball" in the corner. I also boggled Catgirl with one I wrote in different handwriting ğŸ˜ˆ.

I got so many that I felt like I should have made more. Still have a ton of candy left though. Diane and Catgirl and I got a group pose during the tournament photo, but we won't see it until next month.

I also tried giving Liberty a card (made by Catgirl) because she seems grumpy a lot and maybe it would make her happier.

item.title: Won a (tiny) Pin Tournament
item.description:
I was walking into Shorty's and I got bamboozled by Dwayne telling me it was 7 people and just about to start. I lost my first match to a complete n00b which was worrysome, and second to Sergey.

I don't know how I got ranked so highly, I think it's an artifact of not competing very often. Sergey is definitely a level above me. You can just tell when someone's average scores are beating your top scores. I got kinda lucky in my match against him, but that's how it goes.

item.title: Catgirl & Goblin at Time Warp
item.description:
I won on BK:SOW like once and then it was all over. Then we gooned at the kitty loft.

5 images

item.title: #2 on Stranger Things ğŸ’©
item.description:
I got total isolation #2 which I'm not sure I've ever done before. Also felt pretty close to getting 11 drawings.

I keep telling Catgirl how important the rollovers are.

item.title: 1.2B on GZ & Planet X Qualified
item.description:
I saw a tech messing with it a few weeks ago due to a switch being stuck down causing scores to go up continually, so I assume they reset it. 1.2B is good for me but won't last.

I beat Titanosaurous, Gigan, and Ghidorah I think, but didn't get much on the Ghidora fight. Then Monster Zero started before Planet X, which I don't actually know how to start. Pretty nice to feel like it's close though.

117M Carnage was pretty good too ğŸ˜ˆ

item.title: Thresher
item.description: Finally caught thresher shark on Jaws. On to whatever the last one is, and great white.
